settings.subheading: Meet the experts behind the service

settings.text: Use this section for any descriptive text you need to fill out your pages or to add introductory headings between other blocks.

settings.title: MEET THE TEAM
settings.text_1: Co-Founder & veteran artificial turf installer. He’s executed hundreds of commercial, & residential synthetic turf installation projects and knows what it takes to keep your turf clean and feeling like new.
settings.text_2: Co-Founder and an attorney with over 20 years of experience. Ashby has leveraged his expertise in dealing with safety & liability issues & applied it to Always Clean Turf’s #1 cleaning solution, OxyTurf. So you can be sure it’s 100% safe for the environment, kids, and pets.

settings.title: 100% Eco-Friendly
settings.text: You can have peace of mind that our OxyTurf cleaning solution is 100% safe for your kids, any pets, and for the environment. No harsh chemicals, fragrances or additives. Just pure cleaning power that destroys the source of bad odors and kills 99.99% of all bacteria, germs, and viruses.

settings.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
settings.text: We want you to be thrilled with your lawn after we’ve worked our magic on it. So if for any reason you aren’t happy with how great your lawn looks and how clean it is after we’ve serviced it, let us know. We’ll do everything in our power to make it right for you.

settings.title: A Longer Lasting Lawn
settings.text: We know artificial turf can be quite an investment. With Always Clean Turf, you can sleep well at night knowing your lawn will last much longer. We’ll give it the maintenance it needs so your investment is well taken care of.

settings.popup_text: Entice customers to sign up for your mailing list with discounts or exclusive offers. Include an image for extra impact.

settings.title: Cleaning synthetic turf isn’t rocket science. But we take it just as seriously.
settings.subheading: We’re obsessed with keeping synthetic turf clean so you don’t have to be

settings.title: We know what works because we work with turf.
settings.text:
OxyTurf was carefully developed by artificial grass experts who install and maintain turf on a daily basis.

We’ve seen the problems caused by bacteria and germs that survive in turf and can be transferred to kids, pets, any anyone else who comes in close contact with artificial grass.

We partnered with experienced chemists to develop health-conscious, environmentally-friendly products that are proven effective in killing 99.9% of germs in artificial turf.

OxyTurf is an EPA-registered disinfectant that is part of a family of turf care products that make cleaning artificial grass easy and safe in every environment.

settings.subtitle: Germs & Bacteria?
settings.title: Not in your backyard.
settings.text:
Like real grass, turf comes in contact with dirt, sludge, spills, slobber, sweat, animal droppings and every other type of grime that can be tracked across the ground. 

Bacteria gets lodged in the fibers and starts to thrive, creating a cozy home for bacteria and viruses like H1N1, influenza, staph, e. Coli and more.
Keep your turf germ-free and safe for your kids and pets with a hydrogen peroxide (H2O2)-based solution made from biodegradable, Earth-friendly ingredients.

settings.subtitle: Your opponents may play dirty...
settings.title: But your turf will stay clean.
settings.text: Artificial turf at sports fields, public parks, and golf courses all see lots of contact with sweaty equipment, bodily fluids, and other instances of rough use that can spread germs. Turf at dog parks, vet hospitals and kennels are magnets for pets to pick up germs from droppings and saliva.

Synthetic grass at school playgrounds, residential common areas, and parks trap bacteria from sticky fingers, sloppy spills, and standing water that can transfer germs to kids.

Level the playing field in the fight to keep turf clean with an EPA-registered disinfectant that is safe for kids, pets, and plants.

settings.title: Questions about turf installation or cleaning synthetic turf?
settings.text: Tell us what you’ve got — or what you want — and we’ll help you find the best synthetic turf installation and cleaning solution.

settings.title: Turf maintenance is as easy as AGCFAQ
Learn more about the benefits of artificial grass and how to keep your turf in tip-top shape.
settings.text:
Is Turf safe for my kids?

Yes, if you maintain it properly. Have your turf professionally cleaned and serviced on a regular basis and use a high-quality turf cleaner like OxyTurf.

What can I spray on pesky weeds that won't damage my turf?

Most weed killers on the market will not damage the turf. But—most weed killers contain chemicals that can be harmful to your children and pets. Luckily, OxyTurf Weed Control is safe for everyone.

Does the turf need any upkeep or maintenance?

Absolutely! Turf is commonly sold as a “set it and forget it” product which is highly false. Synthetic turf requires periodic brushing, decompaction, de-weeding, re-sanding, and deep cleansing—especially if children and or pets are present. Artificial grass cleaning is a must. The great news is: you can do it yourself (without any harsh chemicals) using OxyTurf.

What types of bacteria or viruses can grow or cultivate on the turf?

Studies involved show the survival of Staph, MRSA, and HIV in turf, to name a few.

Will my pets' urine and droppings smell over time if not cleaned and removed properly?

Yes, if you don’t wash down your turf regularly. Use an anti-bacterial, odor killing-cleanser like OxyTurf to knock out odors without exposing your pets or kids to harsh chemicals.

Does turf mold or mildew?

Yes, both mold and mildew can grow on and underneath the turf. OxyTurf neutralizes mold and mildew using a non-toxic formula made from biodegradable ingredients.

Are all turf products the same?

No. Turf comes in a wide variety of products that differ in material, blade length, backing, infill, color etc.

Do pests like bugs and insects cultivate and breed in turf?

Definitely. Studies have shown that insects like mosquitos and ants cultivate deep within the turf. It is recommended that you spray your turf with a natural insecticide like OxyTurf.

﻿Does turf drain well?

﻿Yes. Turf is perforated with drain holes every 4 inches as well as perforation where each blade is stitched to the backing.

﻿How hot does the turf get in the summer?

﻿In direct sunlight, turf does increase in temperature. We recommend using OxyTurf Cool Spray, it has some cooling agents that help keep the temp down.

settings.subtitle: More Questions?
settings.title: Don’t be afraid to come clean
settings.text: Email us your question and we’ll help you determine the synthetic turf cleaning solution that’s right for you and your yard.

settings.title: How Clean Is Your Turf?
settings.subheading: a powerful synthetic turf cleaner -  deodorizer with the amazing scent of fresh real grass!

settings.title: Get the gross out of your grass!
settings.text:
Now that you’ve installed your turf, think your job here is done? Think again.

Without proper maintenance, germs and bacteria get trapped just below the surface of your turf.

But don’t worry, OxyTurf synthetic turf cleaner-disinfectant deodorizer will take care of the problem!

Introducing a powerful synthetic turf cleaner that kills 99.9% of germs and bacteria using the trusted ingredient Hydrogen Peroxide.

OxyTurf knocks out bacteria and viruses like Influenza A (H1N1) virus, Staphylococcus aureus, Escherichia coli, Salmonella enterica, Pseudomonas-aeruginosa, and many other harmful bacteria and viruses without soaking your turf in chemicals!

settings.code:
Benefits of using OxyTurf:

• One step cleaning (no pre-cleaning needed)
• Disinfectant cleaning action kills 99.9% of germs & bacteria
• Cleans without leaving behind a dull residue
• Bleach-free and safe for daily use

settings.title: Keep your Synthetic Turf as spotless as your reputation!
settings.subheading: Use OxyTurf to kill germs and bacteria in your yard, on your sports fields, play grounds, and kennels. OxyTurf knocks out germs on contact!

settings.title: Synthetic turf maintenance doesn’t have to be a chore.
settings.subheading: Introducing a one-step turf cleaner-disinfectant and deodorizer that’s as green as your new lawn!

settings.title: Hidden germs beneath your turf? Mommy don’t play that.
settings.text:
Let your kids and pets loose in the yard without worrying about what germs they’ll pick up from your artificial grass.

Choose a turf cleaner that plays well with others. Other artificial grass maintenance solutions use harsh chemicals like bleach or ammonia to knock out germs.

OxyTurf’s hydrogen peroxide-based (H2O2) formula is proven effective against microbes like H1N1, influenza, and Staph without exposing your kids or pets to chemical overkill.

Instead of harsh substances like bleach or ammonia, OxyTurf uses the power of biodegradable ingredients like peroxide to kill 99.9% of germs, including:

• H1N1
• Influenza A
• Staphylococcus aures (“staph”)
• MRSA super bug (antibiotic-resistant staph)
• HIV
• Salmonella
• E.coli
• Pseudomonas (that cause ear infections & skin rashes)
• Listeria monocytogenes
• Trichophyton mentagrophytes (Athlete’s foot fungus)
• Mildew

settings.title: OxyTurf kills 99.9% of germs using the trusted ingredient of H2O2
Microbes and bacteria are looking for a new place to call home — yours.

settings.subtitle: Bacteria home #1
settings.title: Your Pet’s Area
settings.text:
Whiskers’ favorite sun patch. Fluffy’s side yard dog run. These outdoor areas are ideal areas for bacteria.

Don’t let germs from your furry friends’ droppings, spray and slobber get trapped in your turf.

settings.subtitle: Bacteria Home #2
settings.title: Poolside
settings.text: Standing water from pools, fountains and water features bakes in the sun, creating a lovely little hamlet for germs to bloom. Attack that bacteria before you’re swimming in it.

settings.subtitle: Bacteria Home #3
settings.title: Your Kids’ Play Areas
settings.text: Where kids play, grime thrives. Disinfect those hot zones in your turf so your family can get back to the fun.

settings.title: Hydrogen Peroxide packs a powerful punch!
settings.text:
OxyTurf fights germs that get trapped in artificial turf without relying on harsh substances to do the dirty work.

OxyTurf does not contain chlorine bleach, ammonia, phosphates, quats, or SLS. Instead, our patented solution is EPA-registered to kill germs and prevent mold and mildew.

The Result: An environmentally-conscious artificial turf cleaning product that’s safe for humans, animals, and plants.

settings.title:
Turf maintenance can’t be avoided. 
But it can be easy.

settings.text:
1. See a spot where grime is growing? Scrape up as much of the filth as possible and grab your bottle of OxyTurf.

2. Hold the bottle 6 to 8 inches away from the stain, then start squirting. Soak the area completely.

3. Let it sit for 10 minutes. Enjoy the sunshine or the chirping of nearby birds. (OxyTurf is busy killing 99.9% of germs and knocking out odors.)

4. Resume relaxing in your Zen-like outdoor sanctuary. Your work here is done.

Is artificial turf safe for my kids?

Totally—if you maintain it properly. Have your turf professionally cleaned and serviced on a regular basis and use high-quality turf cleaner with biodegradable ingredients like OxyTurf.

Does my turf really need upkeep or maintenance?

It sure does. Turf is commonly sold as a “set it and forget it” product which is too bad because it’s not totally accurate. Synthetic turf requires periodic brushing, decompaction, de-weeding, re-sanding, and deep cleansing—especially if your kids or pets are running around on it.

What happens to my pets’ urine and droppings?

If you don’t wash down your turf using an anti-bacterial, odor-killing cleanser like OxyTurf, bacteria from pet waste becomes a smelly, serious problem.

settings.title: A bleach-free artificial turf cleaning solution? This is a total game changer
settings.subheading: OXYTURF USES THE POWER OF PEROXIDE TO DISLODGE GERMS AND GRIME THAT SNEAK INTO TURF IN PUBLIC SPACES AND SPORTS FIELDS

settings.title: You have home field advantage. We’ll help you keep it that way.
settings.text:
Don’t let foul balls ruin your game. Restore your putting green, golf course, gridiron, outfield, soccer pitch or any other synthetic turf to its original glory.

OxyTurf uses stabilized hydrogen peroxide (H₂O₂) technology to clean the toughest soils out of synthetic turf. Disinfect the playing field so that you can rub your victory in your opponents’ faces — not your filthy turf.

settings.subtitle: Use OxyTurf to Disinfect:
settings.text:
• Golf Courses • Putting Greens
• Baseball Fields • Football Fields
• Soccer Fields • Tennis Courts
• Dog Runs • Kids Play Areas
• Employee Break Areas
• City Parks • Kennels
• Commercial Landscaping
• Residential Landscaping
• Vet Hospitals

settings.title: Just because germs play dirty doesn’t mean you have to
settings.text: Commercial turf provides lots of juicy opportunities for bacteria and viruses to hide in plain sight.

Obvious spots like pet messes and food spills in picnic areas are no brainers. But what about standing water puddles on turf near drinking fountains, synthetic turf trash cans, and places where sweaty sports equipment sits during game time?

Other synthetic turf disinfecting formulas contain harsh chemicals, but OxyTurf uses biodegradable ingredients to eliminate grimy agents such as:

• H1N1
• Influenza A
• Staphylococcus Aureus (Staph)
• MRSA Super-Bug (antibiotic-resistant Staph)
• HIV
• Salmonella
• E. coli
• Pseudomonas (that cause ear infections & skin rashes)
• Listeria Monocytogenes
• Trichophyton Mentagrophytes (Athlete’s Foot Fungus)
• Mildew

settings.title: Together, probiotics and peroxide pack a powerful punch.
settings.text:
OxyTurf fights germs that get trapped in synthetic turf without relying on harsh substances to do the dirty work.

OxyTurf does not contain chlorine bleach, ammonia, phosphates, quats, or SLS. Instead, our 6% active hydrogen peroxide (H₂O₂) solution is EPA-registered to kills germs and prevent mold and mildew while our patented Probiotic Protection uses naturally occurring probiotics like Bacillus Subtilis to disrupt pathogen nutrient cycling.

The Result: An environmentally-conscious synthetic turf cleaning product that’s safe for humans, animals, and plants.

settings.title: Your synthetic turf maintenance secret weapon
settings.text: OxyTurf can be used as a spot disinfectant for one-off messes and as ongoing protection against germs lodging themselves in your synthetic turf.

settings.title: For Single Use:
settings.text:
• Use the hand-held spray bottle to douse the affected area
• Wait 10 minutes for OxyTurf to penetrate turf and kill germs and bacteria
• Wipe up excess with a mop or cloth

settings.title: As Ongoing Protection:
settings.text:
• Connect the OxyTurf industrial solution bottle to your watering hose or existing sprinkler intake
• Operate hose or sprinkler system, allowing OxyTurf to mingle with water and soak into turf’s surface
• OxyTurf will protect turf from bacteria and germs for up to 5 months

Is artificial turf safe for my kids?

Totally—if you maintain it properly. Have your turf professionally cleaned and serviced on a regular basis and use high-quality turf cleaner with biodegradable ingredients like OxyTurf.

Does my turf really need upkeep or maintenance?

It sure does. Turf is commonly sold as a “set it and forget it” product which is too bad because it’s not totally accurate. Synthetic turf requires periodic brushing, decompaction, de-weeding, re-sanding, and deep cleansing—especially if your kids or pets are running around on it.

What happens to my pets’ urine and droppings?

If you don’t wash down your turf using an anti-bacterial, odor-killing cleanser like OxyTurf, bacteria from pet waste becomes a smelly, serious problem.

settings.title: A tough but gentle synthetic turf disinfectant?

settings.text:
OxyTurf’s biodegradable formula kills germs & bacteria while keeping kids and pets safe.

It’s everything you’ve been looking for.

settings.title: Don’t let germs & bacteria gain any ground
settings.text: Your synthetic turf looks great on the surface, but germs and bacteria lurk in its fibers, turning your dazzling turf into a creepy carpet of crud.

OxyTurf’s hydrogen peroxide-based formula kills 99.9% of germs & bacteria that take up residence in your turf.

OxyTurf has been proven effective to kill:

• Pathogenic fungi
• Infuenza A (H1N1) virus
• Staphylococcus aureus (Staph)
• MRSA super bug (antibiotic-resistant Staph)
• Trichophyton mentagrophytes (Athlete's Foot fungus)
• Salmonella enterica
• Escherichia coli (E. coli)
• Pseudomonas aeruginosa (cause infectious skin rashes)
• Listeria monocytogenes
• Mildew

settings.title: Tough enough for Fido’s funk
settings.text:
Pet odors get trapped in turf and start to smell bad fast. Other synthetic turf cleaners are complicated and use live enzymes or harsh chemicals like bleach and ammonia.

These enzyme cleaners are ineffective at eliminating the cause of the odors, allowing them to return and they leave behind unwanted residue.

OxyTurf’s biodegradable ingredients and patented formula is safe enough to use on areas where kids and pets play, leaving nothing behind but a fresh, clean scent.

Turf care never smelled so sweet!

settings.title: How to use OxyTurf
settings.text: OxyTurf can be used as a spot disinfectant cleaner for one-time messes and as ongoing protection against the germs & bacteria that try to lodge themselves into your synthetic turf on a daily basis.

settings.title: For Single Use:
settings.text:
• Use the hand-held spray bottle, battery powered sprayer, or backpack sprayer to apply OxyTurf to the desired area
• Wait 10 minutes for OxyTurf to penetrate the turf, soak into the base, and kill all the germs and bacteria

settings.title: As Ongoing Protection:
settings.text: • OxyTurf cleans, disinfects, and deodorizes approximately 1000sf per gallon

settings.title: OxyTurf goes where the germs grow
settings.text: Whether you are cleaning the dog's preferred area of the yard or keeping a synthetic grass sports field safe for the players, OxyTurf does the same great job of cleaning and disinfecting turf without harsh, overpowering chemicals.

settings.title: A bleach-free synthetic turf cleaning solution? This is a total game changer
settings.subheading: OxyTurf uses the power of peroxide to dislodge germs and grime that sneak into turf in public spaces and sports fields

settings.title: For us, cleaning synthetic turf is second nature

settings.text:
Have turf cleaning questions? Want to share some suggestions? Or trying to tackle a tough turf dilemma?

We’re obsessed with today’s synthetic turf technology and we’d love to talk turf maintenance. Use this form to give us a shout from the comfort of your own computer screen and we promise to dig in and get back to you soon:

settings.title: How to clean artificial turf the smart and safe way

settings.text:
You’ve installed your turf and you love the way it looks. Your job is done here, right? Not so fast.

Artificial turf is magnificent, but it isn’t magic. To make your investment last, you’ll need to maintain your turf.

Here’s how to do it right.

settings.title: Stop sweating the small stuff
settings.text: You can’t see them, but you know they’re there. Germs. Artificial turf provides the ideal conditions for bacteria and viruses to thrive—that is, if you don’t clean and disinfect your turf regularly.

When kids or pets play on artificial grass (or when someone drops a sandwich, spills a soda, or just tracks general grossness across high-traffic areas), germs can take up residence and start to grow on the spot.
Use a proven synthetic turf disinfectant to spray down the area and make sure that germs don’t get in the way of your good times.

settings.title: Say “adios” to odors
settings.text: Today’s artificial turf looks and acts just like real grass—for the most part. But because it’s a woven synthetic, residue from liquids, pet hair, and animal droppings can become trapped in the material and start to stink.

Spraying your turf with water helps, but it doesn’t do the same job of annihilating odor as a proven disinfectant designed specifically for use on artificial grass.

OxyTurf synthetic turf disinfectant kills germs and bacteria, replacing their creepy odors with a light, clean scent that is derived from a biodegradable formula.

settings.subtitle: No bleach? No ammonia?
settings.title: It’s a no-brainer.
settings.text: Other artificial turf cleaners use harsh chemicals like bleach and ammonia to kill germs. Sure, they might blast those little biological critters, but those formulas leave behind all kinds of residues that can irritate skin, weaken your turf, and end up smelling like a laboratory.

Not great if you have kids, pets, or quirky neighbors who love to roll around on your synthetic lawn. OxyTurf is different because our formula contains stabilized hydrogen peroxide and not brutal substances that emit weird mystery smells.

With a single step, OxyTurf eliminates odors and kills bacteria using biodegradable cleaning agents that are safe for humans, animals and plants.

settings.title: How to clean artificial turf using OxyTurf
settings.text: OxyTurf can be used as a spot disinfectant for one-off messes and as ongoing protection against germs lodging themselves in your artificial turf.

settings.title: For Single Use:
settings.text:
• Use the hand-held spray bottle, battery powered sprayer, or backpack sprayer to douse the affected area
• Wait 10 minutes for OxyTurf to penetrate the turf, soak into the base, and kill all germs and bacteria

settings.title: As Ongoing Protection:
settings.text: • OxyTurf will clean, disinfect, and deodorize approximately 1000sf per gallon

Does my turf really need upkeep or maintenance?

It sure does. Turf is commonly sold as a “set it and forget it” product which is too bad because it’s not totally accurate. Synthetic turf requires periodic brushing, decompaction, de-weeding, re-sanding, and deep cleansing—especially if your kids or pets are running around on it.

What types of bacteria or viruses can grow or cultivate on the turf?

Studies involved show the survival of Staph, MRSA, and HIV in turf, to name a few.

What happens to my pets’ urine and droppings?

Yes, you don’t wash down your turf regularly. Use an anti-bacterial, odor-killing cleanser like OxyTurf to knock out odors without exposing your kids or pets to harsh chemicals.

Does turf mold or mildew?

Yes, both mold and mildew can grow on and underneath turf. OxyTurf neutralizes mold and mildew using a non-toxic formula made from biodegradable ingredients.
